sentence.Network_en: The Daily Mail has the headline "The Voice of Conscience"
sentence.Network_cn: 《每日邮报》的头版标题为“良知的声音”。

sentence.Network_en: The walls and floors are clad with ceramic tiles.
sentence.Network_cn: 墙面和地板上都贴着瓷砖。

sentence.Network_en: Johnson was clad casually in slacks and a light blue golf shirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰逊身穿休闲宽松的长裤，配以淡蓝色高尔夫衬衫。

auth_sentence.content: BBC Workplace is aware of the Royal Mail site.
